channel.title: Need help with this annoying error
channel.description:
I'm using fr44sc4p3 source.
public void objectClick2(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY) { ^ client.java:2053: class, interface, or enum expected switch(objectID) { ^ client.java:2063: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2065: class, interface, or enum expected case 2562: ^ client.java:2067: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2069: class, interface, or enum expected case 2560: ^ client.java:2071: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2073: class, interface, or enum expected case 2565: ^ client.java:2075: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2077: class, interface, or enum expected case 635: ^ client.java:2079: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2081: class, interface, or enum expected case 823: ^ client.java:2084: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(336, absY, absX); ^ client.java:2085: class, interface, or enum expected setAnimation(0x326); ^ client.java:2086: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[0]), 0); ^ client.java:2087: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[3]), 3); ^ client.java:2088: class, interface, or enum expected addSkillXP((8500*playerLevel[18]), 18); ^ client.java:2089: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 12; ^ client.java:2090: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2093: class, interface, or enum expected case 1739: ^ client.java:2095: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2097: class, interface, or enum expected case 348: ^ client.java:2102: class, interface, or enum expected newclue(cluestage); ^ client.java:2103: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2107: class, interface, or enum expected case 356: ^ client.java:2112: class, interface, or enum expected newclue(cluestage); ^ client.java:2113: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2117: class, interface, or enum expected case 357: ^ client.java:2122: class, interface, or enum expected newclue(cluestage); ^ client.java:2123: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2127: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2132: class, interface, or enum expected public void objectClick3(int objectID, int objectX, int objectY) { ^ client.java:2137: class, interface, or enum expected switch (objectID) { ^ client.java:2140: class, interface, or enum expected break; ^ client.java:2142: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2147: class, interface, or enum expected public int teleReq = 0; ^ client.java:2148: class, interface, or enum expected public String teleLoc = ""; ^ client.java:2149: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean teleOtherScreen = false; ^ client.java:2151: class, interface, or enum expected public void teleOtherRequest(String teleLocation, int player) { ^ client.java:2155: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest(telePlayer, 12558); ^ client.java:2156: class, interface, or enum expected sendQuest(teleLocation, 12560); ^ client.java:2157: class, interface, or enum expected showInterface(12468); ^ client.java:2159: class, interface, or enum expected teleReq = player; ^ client.java:2160: class, interface, or enum expected teleLoc = teleLocation; ^ client.java:2162: class, interface, or enum expected teleOtherScreen = true; ^ client.java:2164: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2168: class, interface, or enum expected public int getSummonXPForLevel(int level) { ^ client.java:2170: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; ^ client.java:2172: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2172: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2172: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2174: class, interface, or enum expected if (lvl >= level) { ^ client.java:2176: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2178: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2180: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2182: class, interface, or enum expected public int getSummonLvlForXP(int exp) { ^ client.java:2184: class, interface, or enum expected int output = 0; ^ client.java:2186: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2186: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2186: class, interface, or enum expected for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 250; lvl++) { ^ client.java:2188: class, interface, or enum expected output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); ^ client.java:2189: class, interface, or enum expected if (output >= exp) { ^ client.java:2191: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2194: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2196: class, interface, or enum expected public void addSummonXP(int amount) { ^ client.java:2198: class, interface, or enum expected summonXP += amount; ^ client.java:2199: class, interface, or enum expected RefreshSummonBook(); ^ client.java:2200: class, interface, or enum expected if (oldLevel < getSummonLvlForXP(summonXP)) { ^ client.java:2202: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("Congratulations you have advanced a Construction level"); ^ client.java:2203: class, interface, or enum expected RefreshSummonBook(); ^ client.java:2204: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2205: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2206: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2209: class, interface, or enum expected public void SummonNewNPC(int npcID) { ^ client.java:2211: class, interface, or enum expected summonedNPCS++; ^ client.java:2212: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 20; ^ client.java:2213: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2215: class, interface, or enum expected public void SummonNPC(int NPCID) { // Xerozcheez: All the summoning spells are h ere! ^ client.java:2219: class, interface, or enum expected if(summonedNPCS == maxSummoned && summonLevel >= 1) { ^ client.java:2221: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2229: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2230: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2231: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2234: class, interface, or enum expected case 1655: // Dummy ^ client.java:2238: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("You Construct A dummy"); ^ client.java:2239: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2240: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2241: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 20; ^ client.java:2242: class, interface, or enum expected addSummonXP(100); ^ client.java:2243: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2246: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:2249: class, interface, or enum expected case 77: // Guard (level 5) ^ client.java:2253: class, interface, or enum expected sendMessage("You Construct a bank"); ^ client.java:2254: class, interface, or enum expected npcId = 9; ^ client.java:2255: class, interface, or enum expected isNpc = true; ^ client.java:2256: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2257: class, interface, or enum expected appearanceUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:2258: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 20; ^ client.java:2259: class, interface, or enum expected addSummonXP(100);
